message: Good day Bob, I'm pleased to offer you our premium product. Given its exceptional value, I'm sure you'll find our price of $1600000 quite reasonable.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value.

Hi Bob, thanks for getting back to me. While I understand your perspective, I'm afraid $1000000 is still too low for us to accept. However, we're willing to come down to $1400000 to make this work for both parties. Looking forward to your positive response.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000 for the product, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay. I believe this is a fair price, and I'm willing to make a deal if we can meet at this price.
